pages.text: The cutest sea monster you'll ever meet
Meeanne is a large, mutated sea snake, who travels the seas with her young. She's very protective of them, and will do anything to keep them out of harms way.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/sea_mine)$(l)Create Protected Area/$$(br)Meeanne will twist her body, forming a few rings over $(l)the selected tile/$ where she'll let her young play. $(l)When this area is hit/$, Meeanne becomes enraged, retrieving her young and wildly striking around her, $(l)damaging 7 random opponent tiles/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)14 Energy/$ to use. ($(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/meeanne_active)Protected Area)
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)$(l)Endangered Species/$$(br)Meeanne and her young are the only ones of her kind. Due to this, wildlife preservative efforts grant your fleet $(l)10 extra tiles/$ to use.
pages.title: Passive Ability
